title: Kha'Zix Evolve HUD
body: Maybe it's just me, but I find the differences in the "+" displays for leveling your skills and evolving your skills to be very similar in the new HUD. Could use a color/shade change in my opinion. I keep finding myself evolving my R, just meaning to level it. Evolving wrong skills at wrong levels, even when you mean to evolve them by the end of the game, can be game losing. But maybe it is just me and I'll get used to the new HUD.

replies.body: Riot is thankfully working on this. I play a lot of Viktor, and this is a problem for him as well.

> [{quoted}](name=TurquoiseYoshi,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=K5AqA1ob,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-08-21T21:11:22.293+0000)
>
> Riot is thankfully working on this. I play a lot of Viktor, and this is a problem for him as well.

Yep, we are working on it.

You have a problem with it on Viktor?

I mean, you only ever augment your abilities when you are at the shop.
Yes, but it's still annoying to have to deal with.

It would be an improvement, don't get me wrong, but I don't find it annoying at all.

I always max and augment the same ability each time anyway; if it prompted as I leveled up, I'd certainly choose the right one regardless.
This doesn't work the same with Kha lol. What you max is definitely not what you have to evolve at all
It looks the same, so unless you think on it, you'll generally assume what it looks like.
I noticed and posted about this a while ago. Sometimes I evolved my ult because I thought I was still leveling it up. Gold Star PBE.
KHA AND VIKTOR HAVE MORE SKINS THAN AZIR
riot is aware and has it on a priority list of hud fixes.
Upvoted because I turned red for no reason and I can't undo ugh
Upvoted since this is a legitimate issue that needs fixing on both Kha'Zix as well as Viktor.
Yeah this has been throwing off a lot of people on both Kha'zix and Viktor. Riot has acknowledged that they are working on fixing this, but they didn't say how long it would take.
Thank you someone understands! I just had this problem where I forgot that i leveled my ult and evolved my ult literally 2 seconds later on accident level 6.
